thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 3 of 217
thread.title: Don. Nottingham

author: Don. Nottingham
title: Don. Nottingham
text: Colorado Revenue sent me a letter saying I was eligible for an unrestricted license so I got that and had my Intoxalock removed and returned. 2 weeks later I got a letter saying previous letter was a mistake and I was out of compliance and would lose my licenses if I did not get reinstalled by a certain date. Cody was understanding and helped me get it set up so I could meet the date.
